title: OGH - Installing Off Grid Submersible Solar Water Pump for our Developed Spring

tasks.task: Fixing a water pump at the lower cistern.
subtasks: Checking the existing diaphragm pump's performance and identifying the need for replacement.
Installing a new Aquamarine submersible DC pump.
Drilling holes in the cistern for pumping lines and ensuring proper connection.
Securing a float valve to prevent over-pumping.
Wiring the pump with solar panel power and configuring the float switch.
Sealing entry points with silicone to prevent critter access.
